an4.128:3.1: 128 Incredible Things About the Realized One (2nd)
an4.128:4.1: “Mendicants, with the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.
an4.128:4.3: People like attachment, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:4.4: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dharma of non-attachment, they want to hear, they pay attention and apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:4.5: This is the first incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:5.1: People like conceit, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:5.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dharma of removing conceit, they want to hear, they pay attention and apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:5.3: This is the second incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:6.1: People like excitement, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:6.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dharma of peace, they want to hear, they pay attention and apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:6.3: This is the third incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:7.1: This population is lost in ignorance, trapped in their shells.
an4.128:7.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dharma of removing ignorance, they want to hear, they pay attention and apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:7.3: This is the fourth incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:7.4: With the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.”
